titles.title: CREATE AI Act of 2024
CREATE AI Act of 2023
Creating Resources for Every American To Experiment with Artificial Intelligence Act of 2023
CREATE AI Act of 2024
Creating Resources for Every American To Experiment with Artificial Intelligence Act of 2024
A bill to establish the National Artificial Intelligence Research Resource, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Cantwell with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 721.

committee.name: Senate Commerce, Science, and Transportation
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption
